projects.name: Sweet Cake Website
projects.description: Sweet Cake Website showcases cakes and delicious desserts with a clean, responsive design using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Sass enhances the styling, offering elegant, customizable themes for a modern, visually appealing, and user-friendly experience.

projects.name: Expense App
projects.description: Expense App is a web application that helps users manage and track their monthly expenses. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite, it uses Material UI for the interface, Axios for API requests, and a local JSON server to store expense data.

projects.name: My Personal Website
projects.description: My website is built with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, offering a fast and responsive experience. Next.js handles server-side rendering and static site generation, while React powers interactive UI components, and Tailwind CSS ensures a flexible design.
